Text.Page:
So now we need you to...let me see what this says...eesh! You've got the big guys next.

Go kill some {@LinkCreature:24#9#desert lightning kumases} and report to Kaera at the Aurum Road Camp.
Kumases' gems are a favorite of all mages. Thank you for bringing them.

I know that kumases are not an easy kill, but I also know a true warrior when I see one. I'm sure that you will be able to handle them all without any troubles. Come back when you complete your mission.
